column4: hey guys..i have been wanting to ask this for a long time now, i tried the forums and other things but could never get the answer, my hibernate and suspend never works and i really want it to work..
if youre using nvidia or ati, you could be screwed
your only shot is what i suggest in http://ubuntulinuxtipstricks.blogspot.com/2008/03/ati-nvidia-resume-good-news-bad-news.html ...if that doesn't help, then well...no luck
